name: GEO_REGION
description: The GEO_REGION table contains information about geographical regions. This includes codes to identify these regions.

columns.name: GEO_REGION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the geographical region record.

columns.name: GEO_REGION_ID_GEO_REGION_NAME
columns.description: The record name for the geographical region record.

columns.name: GEO_REGION_NAME
columns.description: The record name for the geographical region record.
